alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 9:56PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lawrence, western Pennington, northeastern Weston and southeastern Crook Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 955 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Four Corners, or 19 miles north of Newcastle, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Buckhorn around 1010 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include O`Neil Pass, Crooks Tower and Cheyenne Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills
